name: Amnesia (itch) (NomineGames)
description:
Armed with fireballs, heatseekers and a serious case of amnesia, make your way through a selection of rooms fighting zombies and ghost for no reason at all. Made for fun by two highschoolers going by the joint name of Nomine games, thanks for checking out our first game, we plan to update it! 

If you find a bug... it's not a bug it's a feature (except for one, some rooms spawn you in the wrong place, we don't know why, its 1:15am, we want sleep).

WASD - Movement keys

E - Use potion

LMB - Shoot fireball

RMB - Shoot heatseeker (follows cursor)
